Description.Text: Hotel Koenigshof Garmisch-Partenkirchen is a modern 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation and high quality facilities, in the heart of Garmisch-Partenkirchen, approximately 60km from both Innsbruck and Fuessen. Highlights include a restaurant, bar and free Wi-Fi. The hotel is situated in central Garmisch-Partenkirchen, which boasts a good selection of shops, restaurants and bars. Besides various sporting activities such as alpine skiing, rafting and hiking, guests can take advantage of the hotel's bike rental service to explore the countryside and mountains. Nearby places of interest include Linderhof Castle, Neu-Schwanstein Castle and the Partnach Flume. Garmisch-Partenkirchen train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular destinations in Bavaria. The hotel is housed in a modern building with a cream facade. Facilities include a sauna and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. The restaurant offers delicious regional cuisine and a range of fine wines and Bavarian beers. The sports bar serves a great variety of cocktails in a relaxed setting. During summer guests can enjoy drinks and snacks on the terrace. Standard rooms are cosy with a bright modern decor. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite/cable TV and a hairdryer. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower or a walk-in shower. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
